com.io7m.r2.meshes

Interface R2MeshBasicBuilderType


  • public interface R2MeshBasicBuilderType
    The type of mutable builders for basic meshes.

      • addVertex

        long addVertex(long p,
               long n,
               long u)
        throws R2MeshExceptionMissingPosition,
               R2MeshExceptionMissingNormal,
               R2MeshExceptionMissingUV
        Add a vertex.
        Parameters:
        p - The index of the position vector
        n - The index of the normal vector
        u - The index of the UV vector
        Returns:
        The index of the new vertex
        Throws:
        R2MeshExceptionMissingPosition - Iff no position vector exists for p
        R2MeshExceptionMissingNormal - Iff no normal vector exists for n
        R2MeshExceptionMissingUV - Iff no UV vector exists for u
        See Also:
        addPosition(PVectorReadable3DType), addNormal(PVectorReadable3DType), addUV(PVectorReadable2DType)

      • addTriangle

        long addTriangle(long v0,
                 long v1,
                 long v2)
          throws R2MeshExceptionMissingVertex
        Add a triangle.
        Parameters:
        v0 - The index of the first vertex
        v1 - The index of the second vertex
        v2 - The index of the third vertex
        Returns:
        The index of the new triangle
        Throws:
        R2MeshExceptionMissingVertex - Iff any of the given vertices do not exist
        See Also:
        addVertex(long, long, long)

      • build

        R2MeshBasicType build()
        Returns:
        A basic mesh with all of the data specified so far
